Html: I read about this been released mid / late this month but not seen anything about it in a while, any news on if its still in the making or been scraped?
Yep, it's still coming, but no release date has been mentioned that I know of. Since this is the last day of the month, I can safely say that it won't be out this month, though.
Any updates on the Rawr.Tankadin module?
Is there any way I can get a current version? I'm a bit of a theorycrafter and might could help out a bit with testing.
The source code is publicly available on this site, and you can build it using the free Visual C# Express.
